availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Galloway (Caldwell County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Galloway and Mary Galloway. Married to Ellen S. Dudley Galloway in Princeton, Kentucky, on November 3, 1864. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 352A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 71.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Princeton, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #001929335.
